attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the final Brexit deal once confirmed.
attributes.additional_details:
We live in a democracy, one of the key tenants of a democracy is the ability to reconsider one's choices. We knew nothing of the deal then and it would be a disservice to the British people to assume nothing has changed. 

Once we know what is coming we should have the right to chose. 

Leaving on WTO terms is not an option.
attributes.background:
We petition the government to give the public a final say on the Brexit deal. 

We ask that a simple Yes/No question be asked and in the event of a No vote, the UK should remain a member of the EU.
